name: Memories of Us
description:
Game Info

This is an atmospheric walking simulator combined with a visual novel.  The game focuses on the theme of "Senses"  both practical and methaphorical and highlights the story. Game length is around 5 minutes. This is NOT a horror game!

Controls

- WASD = Walk

- E = Interact

Additional Info

Created in 40 hours for iTEC hackathon 2023 - 3rd place

Team members: Tudor Ghican, Rauliuc Catinca,  Aghenitei Ilinca
